skills.name: CLEAR
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance for each ally to Remove One Negative Effect.

skills.name: CALM
desc: • 50% Chance for each ally to gain Immunity for 2 turns.
• Heal amount is based on the target’s MAX HP.

skills.name: AEGIS
desc: Reduces the damage all allies take by 35%.
